SOFTWARE LICENSE AGREEMENT
This Software License Agreement ("Agreement") is entered into by and between XYZ Software Solutions, Inc. ("Licensor") and John Doe Enterprises ("Licensee") effective as of the date of execution by both parties.

1. Grant of License
The Licensor grants the Licensee a non-exclusive, non-transferable, limited license to use the software product "SuperApp" ("Software") solely for internal business purposes, subject to the terms and conditions set forth in this Agreement.

2. Scope of Use
The Licensee may install and use the Software on no more than 5 devices owned or leased by Licensee. Licensee agrees not to distribute, sublicense, modify, reverse engineer, or disassemble the Software without prior written consent from the Licensor.

3. Ownership
Licensor retains all ownership, intellectual property rights, and proprietary interests in the Software and its associated documentation. No ownership rights are granted to Licensee.

4. Term
This Agreement is effective upon execution and shall remain in effect for a period of 12 months ("Term"). The Licensee may renew this Agreement by mutual consent of both parties.

5. Fees and Payment
Licensee agrees to pay a one-time licensing fee of $5,000 USD and an annual maintenance fee of $1,000 USD during the Term of this Agreement. Payment is due within 30 days of the invoice date. Failure to pay may result in termination of this Agreement.

6. Support and Maintenance
Licensor agrees to provide technical support and updates for the Software during the Term. Support will be available via email during regular business hours, Monday through Friday, from 9 AM to 5 PM (EST).

7. Confidentiality
Both parties agree to keep confidential any information disclosed by the other party that is marked as confidential or would reasonably be understood to be confidential, including the Software, business practices, and customer information.

8. Termination
This Agreement may be terminated by either party upon 30 days' written notice for any reason. In the event of Licenseeâ€™s breach of this Agreement, Licensor may terminate immediately, without notice. Upon termination, Licensee must cease all use of the Software and destroy any copies in its possession.

9. Limitation of Liability
Licensor is not liable for any indirect, special, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use or inability to use the Software, including but not limited to loss of data or loss of profits.

10. Governing Law
This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of California, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

11. Entire Agreement
This Agreement constitutes the entire agreement between the parties and supersedes any prior agreements, communications, or understandings, whether written or oral, concerning the subject matter hereof.

IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties have executed this Agreement as of the effective date.

XYZ Software Solutions, Inc.
By: ___________________
Name: ___________________
Title: ___________________
Date: ___________________

John Doe Enterprises
